page.title: 10GATWICK PASSENGER TERMINAL
page.content: We interviewed some local businessmen who regularly travel abroad from {Gatwick Airport.}All were agreed that Gatwick is a very good international airport. As business travellers with little luggage, they had no need to use porters or trolleys. Neither did they use the car parks, Post Office, Chapel or viewing area. One had had cause to use the medical service which was very good. All those interviewed mentioned that there are not enough Customs Officers on duty particularly early in the morning which causes delay. All used the Duty Free Shops to buy cigarettes and alcoholic drinks. The various food catering facilities were described as adequate but not as good as those available in some other countries. It was felt that there should be more public telephones within the airport.
